name: Cheesecake
description: A soft and creamy cake made from a mixture of cheeses.

name: Cheesecake Blueberry
description: Cheesecake variant that is coated or mixed with blueberries.

name: Cheesecake Strawberry
description: Cheesecake variant that is coated or mixed with strawberry.

name: Cheesecake Lotus Biscoff
description: Cheesecake covered with Lotus Biscoff biscuit jam.

name: Sandwich
description: Sandwiches consist of fillings such as meat, cheese, vegetables, and sauces.

name: Cheese Burger
description: A burger consisting of a grilled beef patty topped with melted cheese.

name: Double Burger
description: A burger with two layers of meat patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, mayonnaise and special sauce.

name: Ciabatta
description: Italian bread with a porous texture and crispy crust.

name: Focaccia
description: Italian bread with olive oil and herbs, suitable for vegetarians.

name: Bagel
description: A ring-shaped bread that is usually vegetarian if it does not contain milk or eggs.

name: Baguette
description: A typical French bread that only contains flour, water, yeast and salt.

name: Burger Origional
description: A burger consisting of a grilled beef patty topped with melted cheese.
